item.title: Take Your Office PC With You
item.description:
Mobile professionals often rely on their laptops but might find themselves needing files left on their office desktops. Traveling long distances back for these files isn’t always feasible. Imagine accessing your office desktop from anywhere, anytime. This eliminates the worry of having the right files and removes the need for duplicates. Your laptop and a special application are all you need to make any computer your office computer. GoToMyPC is a remote access software, or KVM application, that allows this...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/take-your-office-pc-with-you/
